bibdata.title: IEEE/ASHRAE Draft Guide for the Ventilation and Thermal Management of Batteries for Stationary Applications
IEEE/ASHRAE Draft Guide for the Ventilation and Thermal Management of Batteries for Stationary Applications
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P1635/ASHRAE 21_D4, Jan 2010

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: The purpose of this document is to provide HVAC and battery system designers and users with information and recommendations concerning the ventilation and thermal management of stationary battery installations.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
